about_the_game:
A set allowing the player to receive 2 horses free of charge. These horses are the star horses Mejiro McQueen and Mejiro Ryan, both from the same ranch.

●How to Use
① Confirm the application of the additional contents on the 1st week of June 1991.
② When applied, the following 2 racehorses will be transferred to the player free of charge to be used as their own racehorse.

Mejiro McQueen (Born 1987)
　Sire: Mejiro Titan
　Dam: Mejiro Aurora
Mejiro Ryan (Born 1987)
　Sire: Amber Shadai
　Dam: Mejiro Chaser

●Caution
・If the additional contents have not been applied by the 1st week of June 1991, then the two horses will be unavailable.
・The 2 horses that can be received through this DLC will not be available unless this DLC is applied.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 10 Windows® 8.1 Japanese version 64 bit
  • Processor: Core I5 2400 or over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 1GB or over, 1280 x 720 pixel display or over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 10 Windows® 8.1 Japanese version 64 bit
  • Processor: Core I5 2400 or over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 1GB or over, 1280 x 720 pixel display or over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
